channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report E-2023100179
item.description:
Report E-2023100179

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-06
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55 gallon drum of silane (un3082) releasing 2 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was cable to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090610
item.description:
Report X-2023090610

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found at WA 126 on belt 1 at NOKC 732 wet from a bottle of CloroxPro Clorox Germicidial Bleach Concentrated that had a loose lid. Upon inspection, product showed to be a hazmat. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag, DescribePack: Box was wet on the bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag,
